title: Skin Fade Undercut
desc: A fade and slicked back hair

title: Low Skin Fade
desc: Fading down to skin along the hairline creates a clean cut edge.

title: Mid Skin Fade
desc: Down to the skin puts the focus on long hair on top. It also makes for an easy to wear cut for guys with wavy or curly hair.

title: High Skin Fade
desc: The high skin fade is also especially flattering for heart and round face shapes that don’t want to add volume at the sides.

title: Skin Fade Comb Over
desc: This classic men’s hairstyle gets a modern update from a skin fade.

title: Skin Fade Haircut – Long On Top
desc: The fresh styles is an exercise in contrasts with long texture on top and short, blurry sides.

title: Skin Fade Pompadour
desc: can be worn so many ways. One of the most popular versions is with a high skin fade and maybe a subtle hair design.

title: Low Skin Fade Comb Over
desc: is another classic men’s hairstyle that gets a fresh update with a fade.

title: Skin Fade Mohawk
desc: is traditionally worn with shaved sides but this version features a short hawk, faded sides and surgical line.

title: Buzz Fade
desc: A buzz fade is the most stylish way to wear really short hair for men.

title: Side Part + Mid Skin Fade
desc: A mid skin fade makes hair on top appear even thicker and darker.

title: Textured Crop + Drop Fade
desc: The textured crop with a fade is a major men’s hair trend this year and a great cut for summer.

title: Quiff + Mid Fade
desc: Short sides emphasize the height of this cool, modern quiff. A sharp edge at the temple goes right into a blurry fade for a cool contrast.

title: Heavy Crop + Low Skin Fade
desc: Skin fades lighten up thick hair for easier styling and keeping cool.

title: Curly Hair + Surgical Line + Drop Fade
desc: Skin fades lighten up thick hair for easier styling and keeping cool.

title: Afro + Low Skin Fade
desc: A low fade adds to the modern shape of this cool afro hairstyle.

title: Short Textured Haircut For Boys
desc: Short spiky styles are one of the most popular haircuts for boys. They also look great without styling but a touch of product goes beyond for special occasions or superhero outfits.

title: Short Crop Haircut For Toddler Boys
desc: Short spiky styles are one of the most popular haircuts for boys. They also look great without styling but a touch of product goes beyond for special occasions or superhero outfits.

title: Boy’s Short Haircuts + Mid Fade
desc: This textured crop is one of the top men’s hair trends of late and also one of the best haircuts for boys. It works for every hair type and tames wavy, curly, and thick hair.

title: Textured Undercut Cool Haircut For Boys
desc: Either the shaved star hair design or designer bedhead on top is cool but together, they are unstoppable.

title: Buzz Cut + Fade Haircut For Boys
desc: This combination of a buzz cut, line up, and fade is one of the most popular haircuts for men and kids alike. It’s super short but so smooth.

title: Buzz Cut + Fade Haircut For Boys
desc: It’s not too surprising that this trendy and popular short haircut for men is just as trendy and popular with boys. The cut is designed to enhance texture even without any hair gel or pomade.

title: The Classic Boy’s Haircut
desc: Here’s a fresh boy cut with that classic fringe and a modern fade at the back.

title: Cool Kid’s Haircuts For Short Hai
desc: This short haircut wouldn’t be as exciting without the shaved line but it would still look good.

title: Boy’s Trendy Haircuts: Side Part
desc: This comb over fade is a cool haircut that boys can wear. It’s so easy to style too. Work some pomade into the hair and comb it over to the side.

title: Short Hairstyles For Boys
desc: Here’s a modern and young take on the Ivy League, the longer version of the crew cut.

title: Short Haircut For Boys With High Fade
desc: Here’s another haircut that’s popular with boys and men alike. It’s crisp, clean, easy to wear.

title: Very Short Little Boy Haircuts
desc: This is a great looking short crop haircut for boys with a mid to high skin fade.

title: Boys Undercut + Hard Part + Slicked Comb Over
desc: Here’s another example of revealing those lovely little boy features with a short haircut.

title: Skater Boy Hair
desc: That long side-swept fringe is the signature of skater boy hair.

title: Soccer Haircuts for Boys
desc: This undercut fade – side part – comb over hairstyle has been a favorite with soccer players because it looks great, even during a game. Grown-up haircuts can have the opposite effect and make kids look their age by revealing their youthful features.

title: Trendy Hairstyles for Boys
desc: We’ll leave you with an on-trend look that is adorable for boys too. This is a heavy French crop with lots of length and weight in the fringe. Sides aren’t too short and have a taper fade for clean ages. It’s the ultimate balance of cute and cool.

title: High Fade Quiff Haircut For Men
desc: The quiff haircut has been a super popular men’s haircut choice the past couple of years. With a high fade, the cut puts the emphasis on messy textures and flow on top. Super cool.

title: Modern Slicked Back Men’s Haircut
desc: A great example of a classic slicked back look. But here the hair on top is left a bit more natural looking. This is not the traditional approach of styling with a shiny pomade. Rather the hair has been brushed back and blown dry with a hairdryer to give that natural flow and movement. Use a matte pomade.

title: Long Fringe + Undercut – Modern Skater Haircut
desc: A cool version of the undercut. Here we have an asymmetrical look with the long fringe in front. Men’s haircuts with longer lengths in the front are more popular and very cool looking. They are like the modern version of the classic “skater haircut”.

title: Choppy Textured Medium Length For Men
desc: A few years ago it was all about short textured haircuts. Then things evolved into longer textured haircuts like this one. This is a good haircut for guys that have thicker hair whether your hair is coarse or fine. The textured cut makes the styling part easier. You can towel dry or do a quick blast blow dry. Then simply work a medium to strong hold pomade into the hair to bring the textures alive. Every day you can get a different look depending on the direction you move the hair into place. That is what is awesome about textured haircuts like this one.

title: Cool Short Men’s Haircut
desc: A nice simple classic short haircut for men to get right now. The hair is styled a bit forward with a flip back and to the side in the front.

title: Modern Undercut + Longer Hair
desc: This is a good haircut for guys that have fine or thin hair. The bald fade puts the focus on the medium to longer length hair on top. A haircut like this one will make it seem like you have more hair than you might have.

title: Textured Haircut For Short Hair
desc: A nice simple classic short haircut for men to get right now. The hair is styled a bit forward with a flip back and to the side in the front.

title: Cool Short Crop Haircut + Low Fade
desc: One of the most popular men’s haircuts for short hair. The blunt cut crop haircut. This haircut is the best haircut for all hair types. It will work for thick hair, curly or wavy hair, or super fine straight hair. Also one of the most popular boy’s haircuts.

title: Hi-Lo Mohawk Fade Haircut
desc: A super cool mohawk fade with a surgical part dividing the fade

title: Cool Mohawk + Drop Fade
desc: Mohawks are also trending and popular these days. This mohawk haircut looks amazing with a bald drop fade and disconnected beard. Style with a pomade that has shine to get this look. These types of men’s haircuts are super cool.

title: Side Part Hairstyle + Long Fringe + Mid Fade
desc: Mohawks are also trending and popular these days. This mohawk haircut looks amazing with a bald drop fade and disconnected beard. Style with a pomade that has shine to get this look. These types of men’s haircuts are super cool.

title: Low Fade + Medium Textured Hair On Top
desc: Finally we have a great looking medium length textured haircut for men with a perfect low fade.

title: Long Buzz + Line Up
desc: The buzz cut never looked so good. This short style features a touch of length at the top with a line up and high fade to clean it up at the hairline and sides.

title: Short Side Part Hair
desc: Combed styles like pomps and slick backs frequently have long hair but not always. This cool short men’s hairstyle features a shaved part and hair combed over in the opposite direction.

title: Crop + Shaved Line
desc: Spice up hair of every length with a hair design. This textured crop gets extra detail from a surgical line over the taper fade.

title: Crew Cut Comb Over
desc: This short crew cut is combed over from the back and at the quiff at the front.

title: Crew Cut Comb Over
desc: The crew cut is can be clean cut, professional, and cool all the same time.

title: Celebrity Style 1 - Classic Taper
desc: The smooth taper and length on top of the head create a nice contrast that’s ideal for all hair types and face shapes, including guys with round faces. It’s a style you’ve most likely seen other guys sporting, and it’s common because of its simplicity and classic appearance.

title: Celebrity Style 2 - Ivy League
desc: Like the classic taper haircut, the Ivy League features a taper that adds a touch of cleanliness to the style. It’s also a nice low maintenance haircut that’s ideal for those busy weekday mornings. You can get up and go with minimal hassle and still have a professional hairstyle that looks sharp.

title: Celebrity Style 4 - Pompadour
desc: Pompadours are generally thought of as more eye-catching haircuts, with Elvis Presley’s pompadour as a notable example. However, a short and tight pompadour can tame curly or wavy hair and give you the clean, professional look you’re after.

title: Celebrity Style 5 - Butch Cut
desc: The butch cut is ideal for guys who don’t have the time to style their hair. And if you like a cut that’s not super short or super long, the butch cut also works for you. You can even do it yourself at home to save both time and money in addition to getting a nice, work-approved hairstyle.

title: Celebrity Style 6 - Ivy League Short
desc: Short but sweet. The trimmed, close-cut Ivy League will fit in at school or work while remaining casual for after-hours relaxing.

title: Celebrity Style 7 - Slicked Back and Side Part
desc: This fashionable combo of a side part and slicked back hair will up your cool factor. Pair with a fade on the side for a high-contrast look that shines.

title: Celebrity Style 8 - Taper Haircut
desc: You can’t go wrong with a classic taper haircut. You can wear the basic style or experiment with it to make a style of your own.

title: Celebrity Style 9 - Crew Cut
desc: The crew cut is both business-casual and utilitarian. If you find yourself exercising or going outdoors often, a crew cut will be your best friend.

title: Celebrity Style 10 - Side Part
desc: If you like parting your hair, check out this side part variation. Classy and refined, this side part is simple to sport but says a lot.

title: Celebrity Style 11 - Close Cut
desc: Try this close cut on for size. It’s subtle from a distance but becomes more noticeable at a closer look.

title: Celebrity Style 12 - Jonas's Thin Side Part
desc: This modest, classic style is built around a thin, subtle side part. This gives the hair just the right amount of direction and motion.

title: Celebrity Style 13 - High Volume Classic Cut
desc: Professional haircuts don’t have to be super short. You can grow your hair out and still keep it formal with a style like this one. It’s still a traditional business cut, just with a bit of volume.

title: Celebrity Style 14 - Induction Cut
desc: The induction cut has grown from a military routine to a style in its own right. It’s a good choice for guys who want extremely short hair but don’t want to completely shave their heads.

title: Celebrity Style 15 - Induction Cut
desc: The induction cut has grown from a military routine to a style in its own right. It’s a good choice for guys who want extremely short hair but don’t want to completely shave their heads.

title: Celebrity Style 16 - Side-Styled Medium Business Cut
desc: The induction cut has grown from a military routine to a style in its own right. It’s a good choice for guys who want extremely short hair but don’t want to completely shave their heads.

title: Celebrity Style 17 - Faux Hawk
desc: Another fashionable take on short spiky hair, this spiky undercut has just the right amount of texture. It’s not overwhelming, but it’s definitely still a spiky style. The undercut on the sides keeps everything neat.

title: Celebrity Style 18 - Jeremy Renner's Spiky Undercut
desc: The faux hawk is a middle of the road haircut when it comes to spiky hairstyles. It’s not the most extreme style on this list, but it’s also not the most conservative.

title: Celebrity Style 19 - Side Turned Thin Texture
desc: Spiky hair doesn’t have to be messy. If you want to rock spikes in a different way, this neat spiked style might be for you.

title: Tapered Classic Slick Back
desc: This classic slick should fall into every Asian guy’s classy hairstyle repertoire.

title: Neatly Side Brushed Hair with Low Faded Sides
desc: Sometimes gel is an Asian man’s best friend. The neatly brushed hair on top will stay in place with a dab or two of it. The skin fade adds dimension to the man’s face.

title: Triangular Brush Up
desc: Asian men’s hairstyles are all about taking the ordinary and making it a bit fancy. The triangular brush up on the front here does just that.

title: Undercut Bun with Slit Line Up
desc: Skin fades are all the rage in Asia now. This drop fade goes about halfway up his head and takes a few years off his age.

title: Heavy Quiff with Tapered Sides
desc: He might be small in size, but it shouldn’t stop him from having a big quiff moment like this one. Make sure his top hair is a few inches long for easy styling and keep the sides short and tapered for contrast.

title: With Bangs
desc: With the french crop variations making a comeback on the little ones, don’t be surprised if your boy suddenly gets scouted to become a model. With a cool hairstyle and a charming smile like this, he’ll be the next face of Gap Kids.

title: Short Haircut with Curls
desc: First up on our list of gorgeous short haircuts for women is this glam hair idea. For this style the hair is very short around the sides and long on the top. The hair on the top is textured and curly. It is such a beautiful hairstyle and it will give you an edgy and trendy look every day.

title: Icy Blonde with undercut
desc: If you would like to completely transform your hair, then this short haircut could be for you. Here have a blonde undercut. An undercut is where the hair is long on the top and shaved around the sides. This is such a trendsetting hair idea, especially as the hair is any icy shade too. Recreate this hair idea or try a similar cut in a different color.

title: Simple & Stylish Short Hair
desc: Looking for a simpler hairstyle? Here we have a stylish short, layered cut. It is a chic hairstyle that looks both modern and classic. This is perfect for the ladies that want short hair that is easy to style and wear.

title: Stylish Graduated Short Haircut
desc: If the short shaved looks are not your thing, then try something like this. Here we have a short graduated hairstyle. A graduated cut involves layers in the hair that start short and get longer, creating a cool finished style. Here we have a gorgeous example of a graduated cut. It is giving us Victoria Beckham vibes so is perfect for the ladies who like to look trendy every day.

title: Modern Short Haircut
desc: Modern and trendsetting hair. For this look the hair is very short and shaved around the back and sides. Then the hair is a little longer on the top. It is more choppy and textured than some of the similar styles which is what makes it stand out. Short haircuts like this would look amazing in a bright color like light pink or blonde.

title: Cute, Medium Short Haircut
desc: Another popular short hairstyle is the bob and next we have a beautiful bob to show you. This one is just a little longer than chin length, it has a side part and has been styled with curls too. It is a chic haircut that will suit everyone. A bob is a great choice for the ladies who want to try short hair without going too short. You can also try bobs in shorter and longer lengths too.

title: Short in the back Long in the front
desc: Modern and trendsetting hair. For this look the hair is very short and shaved around the back and sides. Then the hair is a little longer on the top. It is more choppy and textured than some of the similar styles which is what makes it stand out. Short haircuts like this would look amazing in a bright color like light pink or blonde.

title: Super Short Haircut with Bangs
desc: Want hair that makes you stand out from the crowd? Then you need to check out this idea! For this look the hair is short and shaved but it is a little longer at the front. The hair has also been dyed in light grey shade. Grey is a super stylish color and can be worn with any short cut.

title: Edgy Short Haircut
desc: Looking for an edgy short haircut? Then this is for you! The hair has been shaved around the back and sides but one side has been left longer. This creates a side shave style. As you can see, the longer curls look amazing and you get the best of both worlds – a gorgeous short cut and longer hair that can be styled too.

title: Gorgeous Short Grey Haircut
desc: Earlier we featured a grey hairstyle. If you love the grey looks, then check out this next idea. For this one, the hair is simple and short with a side part. The hair has also been colored with a metallic grey shade. This grey color is darker than the last one we shown you and it creates more of a statement look. It is the perfect hairstyle for the ladies who like to be bold. A grey color like this will look great on all short haircuts.

title: Cute Short Pixie Haircut
desc: The hair is shaved a little around the back and sides, but then the hair gets longer towards the top. There are also straight across bangs too. This is a simple but super stylish look. It is perfect for the ladies who like their hair very short.

title: Short Sides, Long Blonde Top
desc: The hair is dark and shaved around the back and sides while the top layer of hair is long and blonde. We love this hair idea because of the color combination and the layered look. It is a cool and edgy style that will suit everyone. You can recreate this look or choose any color for the top layer of hair.

title: Sleek, Short Pixie Cut
desc: It is a sleek and chic hairstyle with a side part. Hair like this looks effortlessly beautiful and is easy to wear and style. With hair like this, you will look stylish and glam every day!

title: Chick Chestnut Long Bob Cut
desc: So, the hair is mid length with curls and added highlights. It just shows a beautiful style that you can try with the chestnut brown color. This is another great style for the summer as it has that beachy vibe. Recreate this or you can try the cut and color with straight hair too.

title: Chick Sleek Bob
desc: Here we we have a sleek and chic bob. The hair is cut into a short chin length bob with highlights. All of the hair is swept back to create a very stylish and sophisticated look. If you want to completely transform your hair, then go for the cut and color.

title: Retro Cut with Bangs
desc: Everyone loves retro. Whether that be TV shows, clothes and now hair too! Here is a cute and stylish cut that is perfect for those who prefer the trends of times gone by. As you can see, the hair is cut into a layered shag style. It is a beautiful chestnut color. This is fun, unique and edgy hair idea that will make you stand out from the crowd in style.

title: Sun-Kissed Hair
desc: Bold, stylish and sun-kissed. This style features long chestnut waves with added blonde highlights. The blonde shade is quite warm so it compliments the brown perfectly. This is another summery hairstyle and it is perfect for the upcoming warmer seasons. For the fall and winter try an even warmer brown shade such as caramel.

title: Long Chestnut Hair
desc: If you love curls and long hair, then you need to check out this hair idea. Here we have dark brown hair with added chestnut color about midway. The hair is also styled into soft curls. This is a pretty and easy to wear hairstyle that will glam up your look. The cut, color and style are versatile and will suit any occasion from work to a night out.

title: Chic Chestnut Hihglights
desc: Layered cuts have become a must-have and here is how to wear the trend in style. Here we have dark brown hair with chestnut highlights. We love this because the chestnut color really makes the layers stand out. This is a very chic and gorgeous hair idea that will suit everyone. You can try a shorter version of the layered cut, that would look stunning as well.

title: Chestnut Hair with Blonde Highlights
desc: So pretty and summery. For this look, the long hair is styled into beach waves. Most of the hair is a chestnut color with added blonde balayage highlights. The brighter blonde really jazzes up the chestnut color and it looks so beachy and stylish. If you want to jazz up your hair for the summer, try something similar. Different blonde shades will suit chestnut hair color, both warm and cool.

title: Glam Color Met
desc: Glam up your look, Here we have long and beautiful hair. The root is dark, then the hair blends to a lighter brown tone and then it changes again to a warm chestnut brown. We love this color melt and the overall style is stunning. The color will look amazing on everyone and the soft waves are perfect for a special occasion.

title: Chestnut Highlights
desc: You don’t have to be very bold with the chestnut color, you can use it for highlights instead. This hair is a brown shade that almost looks black with added chestnut brown highlights. As you can see, the lighter brown really lifts the hair and brightens it up. So, if you have very dark hair that needs jazzing up, this is the perfect way to do it.

title: Coppery Chestnut Hair Color
desc: As with any color, there are different shades of chestnut. Some are darker or lighter than others and some have warm coppery tones, just like this one. The hair is very long with both brown and red tones. Most of the coppery color is on the top layer of the hair so it really brightens up the brown underneath. The color is stunning and quite statement making. This color is a great way to spice up your hair.

title: Sleek Ombre Hair
desc: Sleek and stylish way to wear chestnut brown. For this look, the hair is long with dark brown at the root and the chestnut color midway. The color change creates a stylish ombre effect which is quite bold because of the straight style. This is a trendy and easy to wear look that will suit everyone.

title: Brown, Chestnut and Blonde Hair
desc: Blonde and brown hair, then you need to check this out. Here we have wavy long hair. Most of the hair is dark brown with added chestnut and blonde color. The blonde color is only at the front of the hair which makes the overall style look more natural and sun-kissed. It is just a stunning hairstyle and it is so summery too.

title: Chestnut Elegant Ponytail
desc: The hair is a rich chestnut brown shade and the long hair is styled into a sky high ponytail. This is giving us Ariana Grande vibes and it is just stunning. It shows a stylish and glam way to style chestnut brown hair and a ponytail like this can be dressed up or down to suit any occasion.

title: Brown and Chestnut Highlights
desc: For this look, the hair is a deep brown color with added chestnut and blonde highlights. The chestnut and blonde compliment the darker root color perfectly. This is a gorgeous and trendy style that will really jazz up your hair. Recreate something similar or add more blonde for a bolder look.

title: Beautiful Brennette Hair
desc: For this look, the hair is dark with added chestnut and blonde highlights. The hair is also wavy which gives the overall style a boho summer vibe. If you want to brighten up your hair for the warmer seasons, this is a gorgeous way to do it.

title: Cute Short Cut
desc: Like a shorter cut? If so, check this out. Here we have a short bob cut that is longer at the front and shorter at the back. The hair also has trendy chestnut highlights. This is a chic and stylish hair idea and it will suit everyone. Recreate this or you can try a sleek and straight version of the cut and color.

title: Dark Hair with Chestnut Highlights
desc: This time the hair is very dark and the lighter chestnut color only gets added towards the ends of the hair. By adding a small amount of color like this, your hair gets jazzed up but in a low-key way. Not only does the hair look very chic, but color like this is also easy to maintain. It will grow out on its own and it can be reapplied if you wish.

title: Stylishly Seventies Hair
desc: Feathered hair was one of the most popular hairstyles of the 70’s. The style was put into the spotlight by celebrities like Farrah Fawcett. Here we have a long feathered hairstyle that is a more modern version of the Farrah Fawcett look. It is a gorgeous hairstyle that will make you look stylish and it is perfect for those who like vintage fashion and beauty.

title: Feathered Bob
desc: The hair has a length that just goes past the chin and the layers are quite short. This feathered style is so chic and and glam. The bob cut will be perfect for the upcoming summer and it will look beautiful on anyone. You can recreate this or opt for a longer or shorter bob.

title: Chic Balayage Hair
desc: Here we have long and beautiful feathered hair with added balayage color. The hair is black with added brown tones. By adding brown to black hair, you can give it a lift and make it look a little brighter. The balayage and the feather cut just brings new life to the hair. You can use any color for the balayage highlights.

title: Rock Chick Hairstyle
desc: Let out your inner rock chick with a hairstyle like this! This hair idea features a mid length feathered cut that is textured and there are long side bangs too. It is an edgy, trendy and relaxed hairstyle that will look amazing on everyone. A haircut like this is for the bold ladies who want to transform their look.

title: Vibrant Feathered Hair
desc: Love bold hair colors? Then this hairstyle could be perfect! Here we have a long feathered cut that is colored in a vibrant and vivid purple shade. The purple is so bold and it looks amazing with this haircut. If you like to stand out from the crowd in style, then this is a must-have for you. You can recreate this look or try a different purple shade. A pastel purple will be great for the spring and summer.

title: Bright Blonde Hairstyle with Subtler Layers
desc: If you want a subtler hairstyle, then check out this next look. This hairstyle features a long cut with feather layers. As the layers are not very short, it creates a more low-key look. The hair is also colored in a bright blonde shade. This is an easy to wear haircut that will never go out of style. You can recreate the hairstyle in a different color.

title: Relaxed and Summery Hairstyle
desc: Love the summery hairstyles? Then check out this next look. Here we have long, highlighted hair with a feathered cut. The hair is textured which makes the layers stand out and the waves create a relaxed and beachy look. Hair like this will be perfect for the summer! You can recreate the sun-kissed look or try the cut in any color.

title: Pretty Feathered Layers with Curls
desc: If you are looking for a chic and elegant hairstyle, then this could be perfect for you. Here we have a shoulder length cut with feathered layers. The hair has beautiful natural curls that make the layers pop even more. This is a pretty hairstyle and it would be perfect for a special occasion. It is an easy to wear and style look that will suit everyone.

title: Sleek and Straight Feathered Hair
desc: If the curly and textured hair ideas are not for you, then you could try a sleeker style like this. For this look, the hair is cut to just below the shoulders and the layers are quite subtle. This is like a more modern and trendy version of the feathered cut. Recreate the whole look for a bright and bold hairstyle or try the cut in a different color. Vibrant colors like red would look amazing.
